Working with ETL
Working with ETL involves processing information from/to external sources
.
The process of working with ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) includes:
Extracting data from multiple sources
Transforming data according to certain rules
Loading data into the target storage (data warehouse, DW)
Moving data from source to storage is a data flow. The data flow consists of the data itself and its structure.
Setting up an ETL process in the System includes:
Creating an ETL object
Setting up an ETL schema
Setting up ETL start
